message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SY

This paper proposes a method for detecting Android malwares using a Markov chain model of application behaviors in requesting system services. The paper focuses on the security aspect of Android applications, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The proposed method involves analyzing the behavior of Android applications, which also involves software engineering (cs.SE) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The classification algorithm used in the proposed method is Random Forests, which is a machine learning algorithm (cs.LG). Finally, the proposed method is a host-based detection system, which involves system-level analysis and monitoring (cs.SY).
